doc.title: Emergency!

credit.role: Jay Benson, Sierra Madre Search and Rescue Team
Doctor of the Rampart Triage Team
Gene, Sierra Madre Search and Rescue Team
Larry, Sierra Madre Search and Rescue Team
Man with hand stuck in sink
Bob, Sierra Madre Search and Rescue Team

doc.plot: This popular '70's television drama was based on 'Emergency 9-1-1' calls to a fire/paramedic unit. Many exciting rescues took place each week as the brave and dedicated firemen and heroic paramedics carried out their jobs, often under adverse conditions.
